text: José Rizo Castellón (27 September 1944 – 23 April 2019) was a Nicaraguan politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Constitutionalist Liberal Party (PLC). From 2002 to 2005, he served as Vice President of Nicaragua under President Enrique Bolaños. He was born in Jinotega. Rizo Castellón died of a terminal illness on 23 April 2019 in Valparaíso, Chile. He was 74. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Disease- related deaths in Chile Category:Vice presidents of Nicaragua
title: José Rizo Castellón
